required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: LD-FUD for Highly Aggressive Gastric Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase II Trial of Low Dose 5-fluorouracil and Dose-dense Docetaxel as First-line Treatment for a Special Type of Highly Aggressive Gastric Adenocarcinoma

lead_sponsor.agency: Sixth Affiliated Hospital, Sun Yat-sen University

clinical_study.source: Sixth Affiliated Hospital, Sun Yat-sen University

brief_summary.textblock: A subtype of gastric adenocarcinoma with extensive bone marrow metastasis and DIC has been described. Few patients have been treated properly due to the lack of clinical trials. We designed this phase II study to explore a feasible regimen for this kind of highly aggressive gastric cancer.

detailed_description.textblock: 5-fluorouracil 200mg/m2/day continuously for 20 days; Docetaxel 25mg/m2, days 1, 8 and 15; This regimen repeats every 4 weeks.

primary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants whose platelet restored to normal range

secondary_outcome.description: From date of treatment until the date of death of any cause of the articipants
From date of treatment until the date of disease progression of the participants

secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of Life assessed by EORTC QOL C-30
secondary_outcome.description: The European Organization for Research and Treatment of Cancer (EORTC) Quality of Life (QOL) C-30 questionaire is a general patient self-evaluation of subjective quality life status. The score of this questionnaire ranges between 0 and 30. The higher score indicates the worse quality of life
The interval from treatment to hematological response
Percentage of participants with confirmed complete response or partial response determined by Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (RECIST)

arm_group.description: 5-Fu 200mg/m2/day continuously for 20 days; Docetaxel 25mg/m2, days 1, 8 and 15; Repeated every four weeks.

overall_official.affiliation: Sixth Affiliated Hospital of Sun Yat-sen University

reference.citation: Morita R, Ishikawa T, Sawai Y, Kajiwara M, Asaeda K, Kobayashi R, Miyazaki H, Doi T, Inoue K, Dohi O, Yoshida N, Kamada K, Uchiyama K, Takagi T, Konishi H, Naito Y, Itoh Y. [A Long-Term Survival Case of Gastric Cancer with Disseminated Intravascular Coagulation due to Myelocarcinomatosis Treated with S-1 plus Oxaliplatin Therapy]. Gan To Kagaku Ryoho. 2021 May;48(5):731-734. Japanese.

Kwon JY, Yun J, Kim HJ, Kim KH, Kim SH, Lee SC, Kim HJ, Bae SB, Kim CK, Lee NS, Lee KT, Park SK, Won JH, Hong DS, Park HS. Clinical outcome of gastric cancer patients with bone marrow metastases. Cancer Res Treat. 2011 Dec;43(4):244-9. doi: 10.4143/crt.2011.43.4.244. Epub 2011 Dec 27.

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Sixth Affiliated Hospital, Sun Yat-sen University

patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: Researchers interested in the same disease
